source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEQ_00<tab>Staelwyrn is up in arms, as his hired hands are nowhere to be found.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEQ_00<tab>サマーフォード庄を取り仕切るシュテールヴィルンは、農作業の時間になっても集まらない農夫たちを、探してきてほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEQ_01<tab>Staelwyrn has work around Summerford Farms for his crew, but several of them are nowhere to be found. The old pirate captain requests that you round up the delinquent yeomen and send them back to him.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEQ_01<tab>「セヴリン」という名の農夫をはじめとする、元海賊の農夫5名が作業の時間になっても集まらないという。彼らを探しだし、シュテールヴィルンのもとへ向かうように伝えよう。彼らは皆、「サマーフォード庄」周辺にいるようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEQ_02<tab>You have tracked down and spoken with all five yeomen. Report back to Staelwyrn.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEQ_02<tab>「セヴリン」をはじめとする、さぼっていた元海賊の農夫たちに声をかけ終えた。「サマーフォード庄」の「シュテールヴィルン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEQ_03<tab>Staelwyrn informs you that all the yeomen have returned to work except Sevrin. He is ill pleased by this, but does not hold you responsible for his own man's failings.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEQ_03<tab>探し出した元海賊の農夫たちは作業に戻ったが、唯一、セヴリンだけは姿すら現さなかったという。サマーフォード庄には、どうやら解決すべき問題が多そうだ。
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_TODO_01<tab>シュテールヴィルンに報告

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>To accept this quest, you must abandon the current main scenario quest. Open the corresponding entry in the journal or duty list and select “Abandon.”
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>受注するには、進行中のメインクエストを破棄する必要があります。
メインコマンドの「コンテンツ情報」から、
「ジャーナル」を選び、破棄してください。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_STAELWYRN_000_1<tab>That sea-sloth Sevrin and his lot─never around when there's work to be done!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_STAELWYRN_000_1<tab>やれやれ、セヴリンたちめ……
セヴリンってのは、お前も以前見かけてる赤帽野郎さ。
連中め、野良仕事の時間だってのに集まってきやがらねえ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_STAELWYRN_000_2<tab>I'd sooner hire <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> for the sake of gettin' things done, but then the rapscallions would never learn.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_STAELWYRN_000_2<tab>おおかた、またどこかでサボってるんだろう。
悪いが、あたりの果樹園を一回りして、
「セヴリン」とその仲間たちを呼んできてくれ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_STAELWYRN_000_3<tab>Round them up and let them know that Staelwyrn would like a word... And don't take “no” for an answer!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_STAELWYRN_000_3<tab>だが、ヤツらは枯れても元海賊よ。
説得するにゃ、少々手間がかかるだろうが……頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEVRIN_000_11<tab>Aye, I'm Sevrin. You the old man's errand <var 08 E905 ((girl)) ((boy)) /var>, now?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEVRIN_000_11<tab>ああ、確かに俺がセヴリンだが……
あんた、シュテールヴィルンの爺さんと話してた冒険者か。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEVRIN_000_12<tab>Tell my <var 1A 02 /var>dear<var 1A 01 /var> old captain not to wet his britches. I'll be along.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEVRIN_000_12<tab>爺さんに頼まれて、俺を呼びにきたんだな？
爺さんめ、余計なマネを……ふん、じゃあ行ってやるよ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEVRIN_000_13<tab>Oh, and just so we're clear─I don't care for landlubbers. Go find the chocobo you rode in on, and ride on out.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SEVRIN_000_13<tab>お前のような、どこのチョコボの骨かわからんヤツとは、
関わらないに越したことないからな、あばよ！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_AYLMER_000_21<tab>So, Staelwyrn sent you. And what do you reckon I say to that?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_AYLMER_000_21<tab>シュテールヴィルンが呼んでるって？
はあ……あんた、オレの今の気持ちがわかるか？
正解したら、行ってやってもいいよ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_Q1_000_1<tab>What do you reckon he says?
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_A1_000_1<tab>Work is for the weak and witless.
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_AYLMER_000_23<tab>Damn right! Didn't get where I am by takin' guff from any glorified gardeners! ...But I s'pose I could see what he wants to get him off my back.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_AYLMER_000_23<tab>おっと、正解だ。
オレの自慢といえば、逃げ脚だけでね……
まあ、今回は約束どおり、逃げずに仕事に行ってやるよ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_EYRIMHUS_000_31<tab>Axes were made for splittin' skulls, not stumps! You know what I did in my sailin' days?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_EYRIMHUS_000_31<tab>仕事の時間だって？
木いじりなんざ、俺の自慢の斧が泣くぜ……
おまえ、俺が昔、船で何してたか、わかるか？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_Q2_000_1<tab>What did he do in his sailing days?
target: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_Q2_000_1<tab>この農夫の海賊船での担当は？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_EYRIMHUS_000_33<tab>You bet your <var 08 E905 ((bosom)) ((beard)) /var> I did, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>! Aye, <var 1A 02 /var>those<var 1A 01 /var> were the days... <sigh> I reckon now I'll have to be satisfied takin' my axe to the trees.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_EYRIMHUS_000_33<tab>あたりだ、まあ、この斧を見りゃ、察しがつくか？
船じゃ毎日、誰かの手足をぶった切ってたもんさ。
……さて、葡萄の枝をぶった切りに行くとするかね。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SOZAIRARZAI_000_41<tab><groan> How am I supposed to work on an empty stomach? Go on, have a guess at what I had for breakfast.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SOZAIRARZAI_000_41<tab>え、集合時間だって？
でも、俺、腹ペコだから、動きたくないよ……
そうだ、君が俺の朝飯を当てられたら、行ってあげるよ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_Q3_000_1<tab>What did he eat for breakfast?

target: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_A3_000_1<tab>パサパサのコーンブレッド
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_A3_000_2<tab>野菜カスばかりのビースープ

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SOZAIRARZAI_000_43<tab>Wha─ Gods, how'd you know!? It's my breath, ain't it? It probably smells as wooden as the food tasted... But I know why you're here. <sigh> I'd just as soon get some real food in me, but I ain't one to reject a summons from the cap'n.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_SOZAIRARZAI_000_43<tab>アタリだ！　
はあ……わびしい飯は、もう、うんざりだよ。
肉を買うために、少しは働くか……

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_WAUTER_000_51<tab>Work? Ha! Can't work when me hands are full liftin' this mug. Ye know, I'd wager me last gil ye'd never guess what I'm drinkin'.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_WAUTER_000_51<tab>おっと、もう仕事の時間か？
だが、気が乗らねえな……
今、オレが飲んでるモンを、お前が当てたら行ってやるか。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_Q4_000_1<tab>What do you think is in his mug?
target: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_Q4_000_1<tab>この農夫が飲んでいるものは？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_WAUTER_000_53<tab>Well, yer right about the “swill” part. I reckon it <var 1A 02 /var>might<var 1A 01 /var> be worth a day o' doin' Staelwyrn's chores if it'll afford me a taste o' proper grog.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_WAUTER_000_53<tab>そうだ、これじゃ酔えやしねえぜ。
ああ、うまい酒が飲みたいもんだ。
その金を稼ぐためにも、ひと働きするかねえ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_STAELWYRN_000_61<tab>You continue to impress, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. All but Sevrin are accounted for.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_STAELWYRN_000_61<tab>おお、ご苦労さん。
セヴリン以外は、農作業に向かったぜ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_STAELWYRN_000_62<tab>It's no fault of yours he squirmed out. I've let that worm wriggle through my fingers more times than I can count.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_STAELWYRN_000_62<tab>セヴリンにも、ちゃんと声をかけたって？
ああ、お前のことは、これっぽちも疑っちゃいないさ。
お前は、よくやってくれた。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_STAELWYRN_000_63<tab>But rest assured, the next time I see him, I'll put him squarely in the dirt, where all such worms belong.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA053_00465_STAELWYRN_000_63<tab>セヴリンのことだ、また適当な言い逃れでもしたんだろう。
ヤツが、この庄いちばんの困り種でね……。
ヤツに関しては、腰据えて対処してくしかねえさ。
